# SpunkArt -- 1-of-1 Original Abstract Acrylic Paintings on Canvas

> SpunkArt creates 1-of-1 original abstract acrylic paintings on canvas. Bold colors, raw expression, every piece unique. Over 300 paintings created, 70+ sold or gifted. Premium artist-grade materials only. Commissions available. Follow @SpunkArt13.

## About

SpunkArt creates original abstract acrylic paintings on canvas using only top-grade premium artist paints, professional mediums, and quality stretched canvases. Every piece is a 1-of-1 original -- no prints, no reproductions. Over 300 paintings started or completed, with 70+ sold or given to friends and family. The process is physical, intuitive, and driven by raw emotion.

## What We Offer

### Original Paintings
1-of-1 abstract acrylic paintings on canvas. Each piece is signed, photographed, and ships ready to hang. Styles range from explosive color fields to textured minimalism. All created with premium artist-grade materials.

### Custom Commissions
Commission a custom original acrylic painting on canvas tailored to your space, color palette, and vision. Commissions start at $500. The process includes a consultation, progress photos, and a finished original shipped to your door. Premium artist-grade acrylics and quality stretched canvas included.

## Collections
- The Damned
- Crazy Aliens
- Dreamers
- The Freak Show
- Faces
